name: zakapp
description: A user-friendly, self-hosted Zakat application with modern UI

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:docker: docker compose --profile npm-tools up -d npm-env && docker compose exec npm-env npm run install:all
scripts.docker:npm:install: docker compose --profile npm-tools up -d npm-env && docker compose --profile npm-tools exec npm-env npm run install:all
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:shared && npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: zakapp contributors
